summary: Feature request to support executing activities outside of workflow context. Workers and clients need to be enhanced to start, manage, and retrieve activity results independently, leveraging new upcoming server APIs.
userImpact: Users will be able to execute and manage activities independently without requiring a workflow context, enabling new use cases for activity-based processing.
proposedFix: Implement support for new server APIs (referenced in temporalio/api#640) to allow clients to start activities and workers to execute activities outside workflow context.
keyQuote: Allow executing activities without a workflow. The clients must support the new (upcoming) server APIs for starting, managing and getting results of activities.
